title: TPACK-Based Music Education Technology Integration and Affective Domain Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary music theory, instrument performance experience, and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Music education program linked to social studies for working professionals, emphasizing creative music activities and technology integration to alleviate work-related stress.

learning_goals: Learners can create three or more emotion-expression works using music composition tools in a VR environment.
Learners can write and present music listening analysis reports using a Digital Audio Workstation (DAW).
Based on the TPACK framework, learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans in technology-integrated activities.
Learners can document and reflect on emotional responses experienced during music activities in a portfolio.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
